thread.title: Typical New York Hotel
thread.title_full: Typical New York Hotel - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: banner65
title: Typical New York Hotel
text:
We stayed for two nights only during a stop over from San Francisco to Manchester. Arrived late evening – checked in with no issues. Standard New York room without any complaints. It was quiet and comfortable. The hour wine social evening on the Tuesday evening is a good idea. Ate in the restaurant attached to the hotel which we enjoyed – not cheap but very nice. Look out for the “Junction Irish bar” just down the road from the hotel (turn right out of the front door)
Pleasant short stay – located near Central Station area
